Love this useful extension for rebuilding my browsing environment after shutting down and restarting.

This is a very good extension but I think it could be even better, if we had a way to separate and organize the tabs we want o save and create something like a ''file'' system for tabs, allowing us to create profiles for the nature of the links contained inside of each ''file'' which I feel like I can call ''tabs'' now that I think about it so I'll refer to them as tabs from now on. 

 I save links from stuff I want to read, stuff I want to study, profiles I want to explore, etc and I'd love ... Show more
Haha, this is what I'm looking for.
10/10 works as expected. a very specific extension that makes work a lot easier. thank you very much!!!!!! <3
This one opens duplicate URLs!
Very useful, love the preserve input feature
Please add a dark theme to this awesome extension.
Simple and handy!
Awesome, really helpful,  Thanks for such extension

This is an amazing extension. Does exactly what it says it does. I use it to work through batches of pages and it is a core part of my workflow. The ability to load tabs only when selected allowed me to avoid issues with a service not liking loading many resources at once, so I can process hundreds of pages.

Highly recommended.
Worked perfectly. Easy and straight to the point.
Great and easy to use way of opening multiple URL links at once. Thank you!
I have to deal multiple links all together at once it was a headache for me untill i found this amazing extension thanks a lot.....
One of most useful Chrome addon in the store. Thank you so much!
Very useful
works just as stated love that you can leave the pages unloaded was great for my application
Excellent add-on, saved me hours of work since years now.
This app is one of the best productivity apps I use. Thank you!
Can you make it so the lazy loading adheres to dark mode. Blinded by blank white when waiting for loading
Simple to use and using since last year

Only opens 1 URL in a new tab, doesn't open the rest. All URLs are in their own new line with no whitespace before or after the URL. It's exactly like shown in the screenshot and it only opens the very last URL in a new tab.
Works perfect

Great extension but I do not see any much superior value than Chrome group tab and/or bookmark all functionality. However, if you add features such as send links to this extension to save to open later, then it may crate some value.
My pc is very low-spec. 4 tab cannot load in a row. But this extension has a option: "Don't load tabs until selected.". This option is very optimize on Chrome. So useful. (Sorry for A1 English)
Exactly what I've been looking for!
all ok :-)
really helpful and lean! thanks!
Worked perfectly!!!!
Doesn't work with my chrome browser
Excellent! This was a life-saver when auditing multiple links. The "Do not load tabs until selected" was exactly what I needed. Kudos to "tp" for this!

There are other extensions like this but this has following features that nothing over internet has. (Believe me I went through a lot from last 4 years)
- Works without bugs in incognito mode 
- Clears input text as soon as you open it AND HAS OPTION to keep it.(YOUR CHOICE)
- IMP : If you choose option to load URL when you open tab AND you are in incognito mode at the same time, it will open in all tabs in incognito mode only. I know it sounds stupid but every other extensions I tried either... Show more

This extension is AWESOME! Not only can I copy and paste a list of website URL's and have them all open in separate tabs simultaneously, but it can also extract URL's from a page of text. I will be using this extension EVERY DAY!!!!
Simple, fast and very usefull
Really wonderful. It works as expected.
Does exactly what it promises.
amazing.  used it for 5yrs.  clean
does quickly, but does not get url from a tab/window currently viewing(-1star)
This is very useful extension. I am very thankful to the developers of this extension.
Love it
The new version can not set quick action to activate this extension. Could you please bring it back <3 Thanks in advance
Its a Good One very useful
good
great, i love it
Effective.
It even works well in incognito mode! It is really for me.
i have nerve damage in my hands and this has helped me soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much
With the option "Don't load tabs until selected" UNCHECKED, I still have a problem which all tabs don't load until I selected.

Definitely can't complain, does exactly what it says it does.

That being said, there are endless possibilities for additional features...
Personally, I'd love the ability to capture the URLs of all of the tabs you have open?

Excellent extension
easy to use 
works better than otherts.
Great
works great
Absolutely in love. The one thing I miss here is a delay before opening a new tab. Like 1 sec delay between opening tabs to prevent overload.
I really love this tools. This one is my daily driver to check bunch of URL. Thanks to the developer.
Great extension. Thank you! Works very well and saves loads of time!
Very well thought out extension. If the popup closes, the links you pasted in will still be there. And its load-on-demand feature is very useful.
Just awesome.
I am using it from few years. This is very good extension

First of all thanks a lot for the extension.
Really good extension with options by RegEx power :)

Could you improve the extension a little bit more?
1. Remove duplicate urls to the same page like:
abc.com
www.abc.com
http://abc.com
http://www.abc.com
https://abc.com
https://www.abc.com

2. Rare but could be useful remove with the same arguments but different order.
abc.com?id=1&q=qwe
abc.com?q=qwe&id=1

3. Give ability to choose date format like "d/m/Y h:m" or at least 24h or 12h mode?

So much helpful for my project 
      Thank you chrome
Thank you so much for this!
Love it.
yes,it tottaly save me much time,it can extract the links too even the links is mixed up..thanks you so much
It forgets the links as soon as you close your window. What's the point?
superb
The developer is a genius
Thanks, it's really really helpful! :)
it's very powerful.
It works as expected!

Great Tool...

Using regularly for opening a list of links every hour or so. I like it very much.
If it saved the lazy-load setting it would get another star.

Great tool does exactly what the developer said it would.

Suggestion: It would be awesome to add a feature where by users can create like 'playlists' of their urls and be able to select which set they want to open.
I would really have several buttons, each with a group of url's to open.
good
Good

Awesome handy tool.

Excellent extension.

thanks ! its very helpful ;) .

Wonderful little extension, does exactly what I wanted and more (extracting urls from text!).  My only problem is that it's been rather slow to open than it was when I got it yesterday, though that could just be a problem with my computer or something.  (edit: now it went back to opening quickly and then was slower again)
REALLY useful.

I espacially like the lazy tab loading feature !

The extension makes life easier.
great!
This will probably complete my move from Firefox.  My only request is a SAVE button so I don't have to always re-insert the urls of the sites I access daily.  It would be the best.  Thanks.
Awesome!

Excellent Extension.  The best feature is the ability to delay loading the tab until it is selected.  This way, I can queue up dozens of URLS but it does not freeze the browser trying to load all of them at the same time.
Does exactly what it says, I use it to open a bunch of links from excel and then go through each tab with an auto hotkey script.
The main point of this extension is to open multiple sites every time. So it has to remember the sites that I open. Add a feature to save a list of websites!
it do not work

Does exactly what it says. Nice that the form pops down from the extension rather than opening a new tab for input.

I have no need  to save the list of URLs for future use like other users. If you do, just use this extension to open all the URLs, right click any tab, select "Bookmark all tabs", then you can right click the folder you saved them all into to open all the bookmarks in that folder.

Love this extension. I like the check box option of links not loading yet until the tab it is on is selected. It helps the browser not to slow down and eats a lot of memory. Don't see this option to any other link opener extension. GOOD JOB!
it would be better if urls could be saved for future use too.

What's the point, if this extension won't remember the URLs you give it. IME you have to type or paste them into the URL text box each time. 

I was looking to save myself 30 seconds or so each time I open a set of URLs. I can do this manually faster than I can with this extension.

Useless.
very useful tool
Cannot save the URLS to open. Have to manually copy and paste them each time.
useful in opening multiple urls at once
Fully agree with M. Croci. Perfect!
fine
Does exactly what I need: allows me to paste in a large set of URLs and quickly open them all.
Nice!
Great job !
Worked perfect. An "open in a new window" feature would be nice.
Works well. Only solution I found to open https urls. Thanks!
Extremely easy to use and very helpful
Treats blank lines as urls.
Would be better if it would just add the http:// by itself when it isn't there
It work great ! Better then other stuff here !
Would work even better if adding "http://" to the URLs wasn't required.
